N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 82.10 - Consumer complaints

State Regulations

The commissioner will accept complaints against a repair
shop up to 90 days or 3,000 miles after completion of the repairs, whichever
comes first. All complaints that are signed shall be reviewed or investigated
except those that fall outside the jurisdiction of the act. The commissioner
may assist in settlement of disputes between the repair shop and the
complainant. If a settlement is reached, a report of the facts shall be
included in the registrant's record. A settlement shall not act to bar the
commissioner from proceeding to a hearing to investigate alleged violations of
the act or these regulations. Notes
